DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect bevacizumab treatment non-AMD choroidal neovascularization ( CNV ) ; eg : angioid streak , ocular histoplasmosis , high myopia , idiopathic , etc
DOC.brief_title: Effect Intravitreal Bevacizumab Non -Age-Related Macular Degeneration ( AMD ) Related Choroidal Neovascularization ( CNV )
DOC.criteria: Cases subfoveal juxtafoveal CNV due nonAMD related cause . Evidence AMD
